welcomePage.title: Eclipse Java Development Tools (JDT)
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with the Eclipse Java development tooling. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: The Java Perspectives To do Java development open the Java Perspective by choosing Window > Open Perspective > Java or the Java Browsing Perspective by clicking Window > Open Perspective > Java Browsing.

Create Java components To start create a new Java project then select the newly created project and choose File > New > Other... . In the left column of the wizard, select Java and double click on Package in the right column. Fill in the name of your package and click Finish.
To create a Java class, select the package in the Package Explorer and click on the "Open The New Wizard" toolbar button (on the far left of the toolbar). This toolbar button provides us with a quick alternative to File > New > Other... . Choose Class in the right column of the category Java, and click Next. In the class wizard fill in the name of your class and click Finish to create the class and start editing it.
Learn more To learn more you can browse the Java Development User Guide.
